name: Monkey Madness!
description:
Scale the tallest tower as a monkey in Monkey Madness! Get as high up on the tower as possible for maximum points! Compete for a high score with an online leaderboard!

CONTROLS: A and D to move left and right and space to jump.

This game was made in a few days as a part of the ScoreSpace Game Jam. My friend PlatypusTeeth sprited the player and baby. The font used is "Early GameBoy" by Jimmy Campbell, found here: https://www.dafont.com/early-gameboy.font?text=Altitude%3A+100&back=bitmap#top. Everything else is by me.
